channel.title: [PI] Food not Healing (Client Sided)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://s24.postimg.org/5c0kj10px/Face.png[/img]
Okay.. So When i eat a shark it heals my Skill Tab hp instead of my HP bar.. Now this is an easy fix i did this to show you that it's not healing the HP bar.. HP Orb is what needs to be healed, and that should boost my HP bar back up? Now iv been told this is in Client.java (Cside) Now i want to fix it so that when i eat a food it will heal my HP orb n HP bar.. Not just my Skill tab lvl.. Kinda hard to explain.. Sorry.

item.title: [PI] Food not Healing (Client Sided)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

In your client you need to find the code that handles the HP Orb.
You need to change the string it’s using to be the “disabledMessage” (As it’s commonly named) of the text on the skill interface.

The code you will be using will be similar to:

String cHP = RSInterface.interfaceCache[4016].disabledMessage; cHP = cHP.replaceAll("%", ""); int currentHP = Integer.parseInt(cHP); String mHP = RSInterface.interfaceCache[4017].disabledMessage; mHP = mHP.replaceAll("%", ""); int maxHP2 = Integer.parseInt(mHP);

Read full topic
